Starting October 29, On a Wednesday is a taking a few weeks off to focus on our new website. We'll be back soon with some surprises!

On a Wednesday

Short interviews with people. On Wednesdays. Read why →

Rob

 The Invisible Dog

⏲ 3:31 p.m. on Wednesday, October 9

What are you doing today?

Obviously attending Brooklyn Beta. Also visiting Brooklyn while I’m in town for a team meeting at Editorially. That’s my day today.

What's your favorite part of the day?

Getting to hang out with a lot of good friends that I don’t get to see very often.

What are you doing tomorrow?

Brooklyn Beta, again. Pretty much the same thing, but I think I’m going to start off the day with a nice, long run through Prospect Park, which will be nice.

Made in New York City by Dave Dawson & Bekka Palmer.
